oai_dc:dc.dc:title: What changes do we want to see at the next OWCs?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Rundgren, G.
Ugás, R.
Siemon, G.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Organic World Congress (OWC) will analyze the situation of the Organic world in 2014, discuss issues and develop strategies. Approaching our visions in a changing environment requires constant adjustments and actions. This applies equally to farmers, the value chain, consumption and the organic support sector. The OWC is an opportunity to reach shared conclusions on what actions and alliances with likeminded organizations (e.g. nature conversation or animal welfare NGOs) are needed so that the Organic World can grow and become more sustainable at the same time.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Rundgren, G.; Ugás, R. and Siemon, G. (2014) What changes do we want to see at the next OWCs? Workshop at: 18th IFOAM Organic World Congress 2014, Istanbul, Turkey, 13-15 October 2014. [Completed]
